#include<stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#define mod 10000
 
 unsigned long int ans[500001];
 int flag[500001]={0};
void pre()
{
	int i,j;
	for(i=1;i<=500000;i++)
	  ans[i]=1;
 
	for(i=2;i<=250000;i++)
	{
		for(j=2*i;j<=500000;j+=i)
		{
			ans[j]=(ans[j]*i);
			if(ans[j]>9999)
				flag[j]=1;
			ans[j]=ans[j]%mod;
		}
	}
}
int main()
{
   int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    pre();
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
       scanf("%d",&n);
       if(flag[n])
        printf("%04lu\n",ans[n]);
       else
        printf("%lu\n",ans[n]);
 
    }
    return 0;
}
